Module sce.sc2002.FinalProject
Package sce.sc2002.FinalProject

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
sce.sc2002.FinalProject.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
Represents an enquiry related to a camp in the Camp Application and Management System (CAMs).
